[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**SCP-8220:** For Your Birthday
**Author:** [[*user Zenobiyl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:ratio-bar pie=-- |ex=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[module CSS]]
#page-title {
    display: none;

[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block
name=https://live.staticflickr.com/49/149731833_030f2608a2_o.jpg|
caption=SCP-8220|
width=260px|]]

**ITEM #:** SCP-8220

**OBJECT CLASS:** Safe

**SPECIAL CONTAINMENT PROCEDURES:** Foundation staff may request access to SCP-8220.

**DESCRIPTION:** SCP-8220 is a three-layered vanilla cake with strawberry and blueberry toppings. A plastic ornament reading 'happy birthday' is partially buried inside SCP-8220 and can only be removed by an individual on their birthday. This ornament contains a message addressed to the individual from an emotionally significant figure in their life, including the following:

* Close relatives, including those recently deceased[[footnote]]See Addendum 8220.1[[/footnote]]
* Romantic partners
* Close friends
* Role models

The described flavor of SCP-8220 varies by individual.

**ADDENDUM 8220.1:** Test Logs

The following results have been observed during testing of SCP-8220.

[[table  style="border-collapse:collapse; max-width: 600px;"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold;padding: .3em .7em; text-align: center; border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver; width: 20%;"]]
Subject
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold; padding: .3em .7em; text-align: center; border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"]]
Message
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold; padding: .3em .7em; text-align: center; border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"]]
Described Flavor
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Eleanor Danry (28F)
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
//I'll always love you Ellie...give us a call soon, ok?//
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding: .3em .7em; text-align: center; border: 1px solid black"]]
"A bit too sweet, but in a good way. Like mom's."
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
James Harper (48M)
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
//We're your family now, Jim...we got you no matter what!// 
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
"Sour, but the aftertaste is better...like honey."
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Rebecca Maynor (51F)
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
//We love and care for you more than anything...it will get better!//
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
"Flavorless. And they tried so hard, too..."
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Connor Austin (23M)
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; text-align: center; padding: .7em .7em;"]]
//It wasn't your fault...//
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; text-align: center; padding: .7em .7em;"]]
"Burnt."
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
